description.en: Learn to use 'no longer' to express 'ya no...' Position depends on verb type: before normal verbs, after auxiliary verbs (including 'to be').
description.es: Aprende a usar 'no longer' para expresar 'ya no...' La posición depende del tipo de verbo: antes de verbos normales, después de verbos auxiliares (incluyendo 'to be').

prompt.es: Ya no lo considero un candidato viable.

exercises.solution: I no longer consider him a viable candidate.

tip.en: With normal verbs (not auxiliaries), place 'no longer' BEFORE the main verb, after the subject: Subject + no longer + verb.
tip.es: Con verbos normales (no auxiliares), coloca 'no longer' ANTES del verbo principal, después del sujeto: Sujeto + no longer + verbo.

prompt.es: Ya no me tengo que levantar temprano.

exercises.solution: I no longer have to get up early.

tip.en: With normal verbs (not auxiliaries), place 'no longer' BEFORE the main verb, after the subject: Subject + no longer + verb.
tip.es: Con verbos normales (no auxiliares), coloca 'no longer' ANTES del verbo principal, después del sujeto: Sujeto + no longer + verbo.

prompt.es: Ya no creo en las hadas.

exercises.solution: I no longer believe in fairies.

tip.en: With normal verbs (not auxiliaries), place 'no longer' BEFORE the main verb, after the subject: Subject + no longer + verb.
tip.es: Con verbos normales (no auxiliares), coloca 'no longer' ANTES del verbo principal, después del sujeto: Sujeto + no longer + verbo.

prompt.es: Ya no me duele cuando hago ejercicio.

exercises.solution: It no longer hurts when I do exercise.

tip.en: With normal verbs (not auxiliaries), place 'no longer' BEFORE the main verb, after the subject: Subject + no longer + verb.
tip.es: Con verbos normales (no auxiliares), coloca 'no longer' ANTES del verbo principal, después del sujeto: Sujeto + no longer + verbo.

tip.en: With normal verbs (not auxiliaries), place 'no longer' BEFORE the main verb, after the subject: Subject + no longer + verb.
tip.es: Con verbos normales (no auxiliares), coloca 'no longer' ANTES del verbo principal, después del sujeto: Sujeto + no longer + verbo.

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs (including 'to be': am/is/are, can/could, will/would, etc.), place 'no longer' AFTER the auxiliary verb.
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares (incluyendo 'to be': am/is/are, can/could, will/would, etc.), coloca 'no longer' DESPUÉS del verbo auxiliar.

prompt.es: Ya no puede jugar a nivel profesional.

exercises.solution: He can no longer play professionally.

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs (including 'to be': am/is/are, can/could, will/would, etc.), place 'no longer' AFTER the auxiliary verb.
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares (incluyendo 'to be': am/is/are, can/could, will/would, etc.), coloca 'no longer' DESPUÉS del verbo auxiliar.

exercises.solution: He is no longer captain of the national side.

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs (including 'to be': am/is/are, can/could, will/would, etc.), place 'no longer' AFTER the auxiliary verb.
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares (incluyendo 'to be': am/is/are, can/could, will/would, etc.), coloca 'no longer' DESPUÉS del verbo auxiliar.

exercises.solution: I'm no longer bored at work.
